short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Management toolset for developers and freelancers. Track time, write invoices, take meeting notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zeitkit is the ultimate tool collection for developers and freelancers. Zeitkit combines common tools into a simple and user friendly app.

-Track time for clients. Log what you did.
-Painlessly invoice your clients.
-Keep track of Expenses.
-Take meeting notes.

All in a highly productive interface to reduce overhead, allowing you to focus and bill more time.
